already_in_set: This song is already in this set. Can't add a second time.
backmp3: Instrument and backing vocals only MP3
choose_lang_msg: Below, you can choose the language you would like to use the app in.
chrome-enable-localfile: To enable offline song playback, please enable the "Allow access to file URLs" option in the chrome extension settings
copy-error: Song could not be copied - press Ctrl+C now to copy it
copy_link: Or copy the link below to share
copyright_no_show: Unfortunately, due to copyright reasons this song cannot be displayed
db-langs-download-error: There was an error downloading or installing the song databases. Either your device has run out of space or you have a problem with your internet connection. Please check and try again.
db-langs-intro: Please select one or more song databases that you wish to download
db-langs-select-one: Please select one or more song databases to download
db-langs-update-succeeded: Successfully downloaded and installed your song databases
db-type-offline: Offline: Select languages to download and works offline
db-type-online: Online: All languages, but requires internet connection and is slower
dbload-failed: Error fetching initialization data. Please turn your internet connection on and click 'Retry' below.
dbreload_failed: Database update failed, please check your internet connection
delete_set_confirm: Do you really want to delete this set?
download_file_error: There was an error downloading this file
edit_submit_failed: Could not submit your song - are you connected to the internet?
edit_submit_success: Thanks! Your song has been submitted, please wait a day or two for it to be added to the database.
edit_welcome_text: Please correct the song below, or add one you have written yourself and then click the 'Upload' button. If you have MP3s, please email them to contact@worshipleaderapp.com.
firsttime_welcome: Welcome to Worship Leader. On each page there will be a short help message appearing at the bottom of your screen. To see the full help, touch the message. To turn these messages off, go to the settings page.
help_page_db_langs: Choose which language songs you would like to download. They will be automatically updated after a week when you next connect to the internet.
help_page_list: Type in a song number or phrase to search for a song. You can search using transliteration into western characters, or using language-specific characters. You can use the * character as a wildcard eg har*heral, or . to represent a single character eg je.us. Click the dropdown to see the many advanced filters available.
help_page_set_list: Here you can see a list of any worship sets that you have created. These help you to click forwards and backwards between songs. You can create these by clicking 'Add to Set' when viewing a song.
help_page_set_view: Here are all the songs in your worship set. You can reorder them by dragging on the reorder icon next to each song, or remove them by clicking the cross icon.
help_page_settings: You can off these help messages on this page and also change a number of other app settings.
help_page_songinfo: You can see chords and transpose if you have set the 'Show Chords' setting. If there is sheet music you can click the button to switch to it. When the sheet music is showing you can short press/click it to play/pause, and long press/right click to play from the beginning. At the top you can click through to different language versions of the song if there are any. You can listen to the MP3s. Also, you can add this song to a set so that you can use it more easily during a worship time.
langpack-not-loaded: Could not change the language - perhaps you are not connected to the internet?
mp3nonetwork: Couldn't download the MP3 to play - check your network connection
native_prompt_body: You are currently using this app in a web browser. It's much easier to use the native app available from the store. Do you want to download this now?
no-sets: You don't have any sets yet, choose a song and click 'Add Song to Set' to make one
noprintsupport: Your browser does not support printing
search_placeholder: Search by title, phrase or song number
set_create: Create and add song to set
setting-display-lyrics: Display Lyrics? (security measure for people in countries where phones may be searched)
setting-hide-toolbar-btn: Hide top button text to make titles wider
setting-poweron: Don't allow screen to turn off while using program
setting-show-key-in-list: Show key, time signature and tempo in song list
setting-sidebyside: Do side-by-side display of translated songs
setting-transitions: Use transitions? (turn off for slow phones)
share_set_title: Do you want to share a copy of the set, or a live set which only you can make changes to and will automatically update for everyone when you make changes (if connected to the internet)?
share_title: How do you want to share this?

tags.mbb-lyrics: Lyrics appropriate for people from Muslim backgrounds
tags.mbb-style: Style appropriate for people from Muslim backgrounds

unknown-song: Song not available - connect to internet to try again?
